name: Team Leader
description: I led the SignAI project, an innovative initiative in which we developed a Chilean Sign Language (LSCh) interpreter service using Artificial Intelligence. This project was proposed to the CITT of Concepción and developed by my team as a Final Project (CAPSTONE)
activities: I led, planned and managed the development of the project.
Won first place in “Social Impact” category.
Won second place in “Project of the Year” category at DemoDay 2024, DuocUC.
Best evaluated CAPSTONE project of 2024 in the Computer Engineering career.

name: Mobile Development Track Leader
description: I led the Mobile Development Track (Workshop), teaching over 50 students and participating in key projects and events
activities: I led, managed and developed projects with my students.
I encouraged hands-on learning and technological innovation among students
I participated in several activities and educational talks in schools, high schools and other institutions.

name: FlexPartner Developer
description: During my internship, I was part of the first group to test the company's internship program, contributing significant improvements and developing innovative solutions.
activities: I developed a solution together with my team using internal tools and frameworks.
I identified and reporting new functionalities and potential security issues within the Masterbase internal tools and frameworks.
I collaborated in the implementation of new functionalities adapted to the needs of the area.

name: Assistant Professor
description: During my first year I taught assistantships to students of Programmer Analyst and Network and Connectivity Engineering, facilitating the learning and development of practical skills in programming
activities: I guided the students in the deep understanding of the contents of the subject.
I contributed to the improvement of their grades in subsequent evaluations.
I encouraged the effective use of Python to solve algorithmic problems.
